reviews.text: Martin Scorsese's new film, starring De Niro, Pacino and Pesci, is as much about friendship and the passing of time as it is a thriller.
At its core, The Irishman is a tale on betrayal, violence, and the sacrificing of moral principles, with slithers of regret traced into it all.
